group_1.textLeft: …Sooo that was, like, totes crazy!

group_1.textRight: Oh dear… It sounds like you had a difficult time,@ too, Hime.

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, Sasha, here’s the new cosmetics I got.
Aren’t they ridiculously adorbs?

group_1.textCenter: Lady Saaan! More, more! Harder, pleaaase!

group_1.textRight: My, that gold flake eyeshadow is quite lovely! ♪
I think I’m starting to get used to this feeling, somehow…

group_1.textLeft: Uh… You mean the stuff with Miyuri…?

group_1.textRight: …Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: …It’s more like a way to practice tuning things out.
If you notice, you lose…or something…

group_1.textRight: Excuse me, Miyu. Would you mind keeping your@voice down?
You’re going to get the entire Youth Association@to come check on us.

group_1.textLeft: It’s just- it’s just- Lady San, your guidance is too stimulating…!

group_1.textRight: You’re the one who’s begging for more.
I don’t have a choice but to increase the pressure…

group_1.textLeft: How are you getting this excited about stretching exercises…?

group_1.textRight: When I first saw you doing this, I wondered what@was happening…
Hey, since you’re a Magical Girl, do you even need@to do stretches?

group_1.textLeft: Of course- of course I do!
It’s important to check your joints’ range of motion every day.
Otherwise you could hurt yourself if you move@them too fast!
I’m an athlete, so I know a lot about these things!

group_1.textRight: …That reminds me,
you’re an inline skater, aren’t you, Miyu?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah!

group_1.textRight: Skates are also your weapon in your Magical Girl@form.
Oh yeah, you’ve got those rollerblade thingies,@right?★

group_1.textLeft: Well, that’s about it. It started out as a hobby.
Lately, I’ve also been active
in freestyle competitions!

group_1.textRight: Both you and the Instructor are kinda the@jock type, huh?
Or should I call you a pair of knuckleheads?@[chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]Kyaha!★

group_1.textLeft: W-w-w-wha… I don’t care if you insult me,@but don’t say that about Lady San!

group_1.textRight: A-awawa…
O-of course, Miyu. Anyhow,
when did you start skating in the first place?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, right, I haven’t really told you about that yet,@huh?
I didn’t used to be a very athletic person.

group_1.textRight: …Eh? You didn’t…?

group_1.textLeft: I was- I was especially bad when it came to foot@races.
My parents were concerned about that,
so they bought me a pair of inline skates
to help me get a feel for what it’s like to run fast!

group_1.textRight: We have something for you today, Miyu.

group_1.textLeft: For me…?

group_1.textRight: Yes. Here you go.

group_1.textLeft: Wow…!

group_1.textRight: It’s a pair of inline skates.
If you’re comfortable, why not give them a little@go?

group_1.textLeft: I dunno if I can do it…

group_1.textRight: Well, even if you can’t, that’s fine too.

group_1.textLeft: …Okay. I’ll try!

group_1.textCenter: I’m cutting right through the wind…!
